HOME.TITLE: Graasp
HOME.SUBTITLE: Your learning experience platform
HOME.DESCRIPTION: Revolutionize your education and professional development! Our platform cares for the needs of educators and researchers, seeking a complete solution for content creation, presentation, and collaborative knowledge sharing.

MISSION.TITLE: Our mission
MISSION.DESCRIPTION: We aim at empowering educators to become the best professionals they can be, through technology and revolutionizing their teaching and learning experiences in a wide learning community!
MISSION.CALL_TO_ACTION_LABEL: Do you want to know more?

BUILDER.DESCRIPTION: To create rich and interactive material

PLAYER.DESCRIPTION: And let learners access material in a new way

ANALYTICS.DESCRIPTION: To collect insights and data about your className

LIBRARY.DESCRIPTION: To find resources and be part of a community

FOOTER.TAG_LINE: Developed in Switzerland by the Graasp Association
